Package <Unnamed>

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    AssetService
    The AssetService interface defines the contract for managing a collection of Asset objects.
    FilesFunction
    The FilesFunction interface defines methods for saving to and reading from a file.
    ReportService
    The ReportService interface defines the contract for generating and downloading reports related to a user's financial or asset data.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AddFinGoal
    The AddFinGoal class allows users to add, view, and track their financial goals.
    Asset
    Represents a financial asset such as stocks, real estate, or gold.
    assetFactory
    The assetFactory class is responsible for creating instances of specific asset types (e.g., Stock, RealEstate, Gold) based on user input.
    Gold
    The Gold class represents a gold asset, which is a specific type of Asset.
    login
    The Login class handles user authentication by verifying credentials against a stored user file.
    Main  
    RealEstate
    The RealEstate class represents a real estate asset, extending the Asset class.
    SignUP
    The SignUP class handles user registration for the application.
    Stock
    The Stock class represents a stock asset and extends the Asset class.
    StockAccount
    The StockAccount class manages a user's stock trading account information such as email, password, and associated platform.
    User
    The User class represents a user with authentication-related information such as email, password, unique username, and name.
    verifyFinGoal
    The verifyFinGoal class provides validation methods for financial goal attributes such as goal type, target amount, current progress, and deadline date.
    verifyUser
    The verifyUser class provides utility methods for validating user input during registration or login, including name, email, password, and username format checks.
    Zakatcalculator
    The Zakatcalculator class calculates Zakat for a user's investment portfolio and generates/downloads a detailed report based on Islamic financial principles.
